purpose: To explain the importance of understanding diversity, equity, and inclusion in organizations.
title: Addressing and responding to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion requires an understanding of all three dimensions
reasoning_strategy: Descriptive explanation of the three dimensions and how each is measured.
layout: Title at top, infographic on left, text explanations on right

visual_elements.label:
Diversity
Who is represented in the workforce

Equity
How we ensure equality of opportunity

Inclusion
How the workforce experiences the workplace
